comment.author: 62104855@N04
comment._content: Yes,my own soul has been very much distruburbed;and you,o god-how long?Do return,o god,do rescue my soul;save me for the sake of your loving-kindness.For in death there is no mention of you;in of who will luad you?I have grown weary with my sighing;all night long i make my couch swim;with my tears i make my own divan overflow.
